verses.verse: Where <S%G4159><s%> do wars <S%G4171><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fightings <S%G3163><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> come from? <S%G3756><s%> Don't they come <S%G1782><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> pleasures <S%G2237><s%> that war <S%G4754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members? <S%G3196><s%>

You lust, <S%G1937><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> have. <S%G2192><s%> You kill, <S%G5407><s%> covet, <S%G2206><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> can't <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> obtain. <S%G2013><s%> You fight <S%G3164><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make war. <S%G4170><s%> <S%G1161><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> have, <S%G2192><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> ask. <S%G154><s%>

You ask, <S%G154><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> receive, <S%G2983><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> with wrong motives, <S%G2560><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> you may spend <S%G1159><s%> it for <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> pleasures. <S%G2237><s%>

You adulterers <S%G3432><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulteresses, <S%G3428><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> know that <S%G3754><s%> friendship <S%G5373><s%> with the world <S%G2889><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> enmity <S%G2189><s%> with God? <S%G2316><s%> Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> wants <S%G1014><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> makes <S%G2525><s%> himself an enemy <S%G2190><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Or do <S%G2228><s%> you think <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> in vain, <S%G2761><s%> "The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> lives <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> yearns <S%G1971><s%> <S%G4314><s%> jealously <S%G5355><s%>"?

But <S%G1161><s%> he gives <S%G1325><s%> more <S%G3173><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%> Therefore <S%G1352><s%> it says, <S%G3004><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> resists <S%G498><s%> the proud, <S%G5244><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble. <S%G5011><s%>"

Be subject <S%G5293><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%> But resist <S%G436><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

Draw near <S%G1448><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will draw near <S%G1448><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%> Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> your hands, <S%G5495><s%> you sinners; <S%G268><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> purify <S%G48><s%> your hearts, <S%G2588><s%> you double-minded. <S%G1374><s%>

Lament, <S%G5003><s%> <S%G2532><s%> mourn, <S%G3996><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weep. <S%G2799><s%> Let <S%G3344><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> laughter <S%G1071><s%> be turned <S%G3344><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> mourning, <S%G3997><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your joy <S%G5479><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> gloom. <S%G2726><s%>
Humble yourselves <S%G5013><s%> in the sight of <S%G1799><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will exalt <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5312><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> speak <S%G2635><s%> against <S%G2635><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%> He who <S%G3588><s%> speaks against <S%G2635><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> speaks against <S%G2635><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you judge <S%G2919><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a doer <S%G4163><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G235><s%> a judge. <S%G2923><s%>

Only one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the lawgiver, <S%G3550><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to destroy. <S%G622><s%> But who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> another? <S%G2087><s%>

Come <S%G71><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> you <S%G3588><s%> who say, <S%G3004><s%> "Today <S%G4594><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> tomorrow <S%G839><s%> let <S%G4198><s%>'s go into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G3592><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spend <S%G4160><s%> a <S%G1520><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> trade, <S%G1710><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make a <S%G1520><s%> profit. <S%G2770><s%>"

Whereas <S%G3748><s%> you don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1987><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> your life will be like tomorrow. <S%G839><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> life? <S%G2222><s%> For you are <S%G2076><s%> a <S%G1063><s%> vapor, <S%G822><s%> that appears <S%G5316><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a little time, <S%G3641><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> vanishes away. <S%G853><s%>

For <S%G473><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> ought to say, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> wills, <S%G2532><s%> we will both live, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> that. <S%G1565><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> you glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> boasting. <S%G212><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> evil. <S%G4190><s%>

To him therefore <S%G3767><s%> who knows <S%G1492><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doesn't <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> to him it is <S%G2076><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
